metadata.name: Paid Ad Creative Development
metadata.description: Develop platform-specific ad creatives optimized for performance

task.instructions: # Paid Ad Creative Development Create high-performing ad creatives optimized for each platform. ## Platform Best Practices **Google Search**: Compelling headlines, clear value prop, strong CTA **Google Display/YouTube**: Eye-catching visuals, brand recognition, clear message **Facebook/Instagram**: Stop-the-scroll creative, benefit-focused, mobile-optimized **LinkedIn**: Professional, value-focused, B2B appropriate **TikTok**: Authentic, native-feeling, hook in first 3 seconds ## Creative Elements - Multiple headline variations - Image/video variations - CTA variations - Ad copy variations - Landing page alignment ## Testing Strategy - A/B test creative elements - Refresh creative every 4-6 weeks - Scale winners, iterate losers
